transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_025260.3 but with the polyA tail removed.
There is a difference(s) in the non-coding region of this transcript with respect to the Primary Genome Assembly (GRCh38). See the sequence difference(s)

transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_138272.2 but with the polyA tail removed.
There is a difference(s) in the non-coding region of this transcript with respect to the Primary Genome Assembly (GRCh38). See the sequence difference(s)
